3.2.0.name: wordpress/duplicate-posts-remover
3.2.0.description:
Duplicate Posts Remover gives you the possibilty of moving to trash the posts and pages with duplicated title. This plugin has been developed using pure Ajax and offers a friendly user interface to manage post and pages.

1.Download and install the Plugin.

2.It will appear in the sidebar of your wp-admin view, click on it.

3.On the new screen, there is a display that will show you how many total articles you have and how many of them have duplicate titles.

4.Click on Duplicate Content (if the number is over zero).

5.A list will appear with the duplicate titles listed. Realize that these titles are not related to one another and that this Plugin only shows you the most recent article posted with that title. Say you have Article A that was originally posted on March 21st. This Plugin lists Article B that was uploaded on May 16th with the same title.
